verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* raged, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* devised vain things?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* princes met \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* Christ.

Let \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w break|strong="H5423"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* asunder: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* let \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* yoke \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w He|strong="H8064"\w* \w that|strong="H0136"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*: \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* deride \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shall \w he|strong="H0227"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* trouble \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* rage.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* appointed \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Sion \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, preaching \w his|strong="H5921"\w* commandment.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: Thou art \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* thee.

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* utmost parts \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

Thou shalt rule \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3335"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3627"\w* shalt break \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \w in|strong="H3627"\w* pieces like \w a|strong="H3335"\w* \w potterâ€™s|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, O ye \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*: receive \w instruction|strong="H3256"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w*.

Embrace discipline, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w at|strong="H1870"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* time \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w angry|strong="H0599"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w from|strong="H0006"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.
When his wrath shall be kindled in a short time, blessed are all they that trust in him.
